channel.title: Nvidia on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Nvidia on FinanClub

item.title: SOUN
item.description: score:142 Chances: SoundHound AI Inc. (NASDAQ: SOUN) reported substantial year-over-year gains in its recent financial results for the fourth quarter and full year 2023. The company announced an innovative in-vehicle voice assistant using a large language model completely on the edge while running on the NVIDIA DRIVE platform, showcasing technological advancements.
